description: Create a scanned parcel. Call this API when scanning the tracking number on the parcel.

query.name: cageNumber
query.description: Cage number. If cage number is present, it will be validated. In case missing cage number, the system will choose default cage number

query.name: serviceType
query.description: Accept values: SELLER_DROPOFF, CUSTOMER_DROPOFF (Customer return), CUSTOMER_COLLECTION (Collection point)

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/station/v1/scanned-parcels/create')
request.add_api_parameter("stationId", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("cageNumber", "123")
request.add_api_parameter("trackingNumber", "TEST1231124VN")
request.add_api_parameter("serviceType", "SELLER_DROPOFF")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/station/v1/scanned-parcels/create')
request.add_api_param('stationId', '1234')
request.add_api_param('cageNumber', '123')
request.add_api_param('trackingNumber', 'TEST1231124VN')
request.add_api_param('serviceType', 'SELLER_DROPOFF')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
